00023 #include "shared_hash.hpp"

00025 namespace uStreamLib {
00026         SharedHash::SharedHash(void)
00027         {
00028                 setClassID(UOSUTIL_RTTI_SHARED_HASH);
00029         }
00030 
00031         SharedHash::~SharedHash(void)
00032         {
00033                 // nothing to do
00034         }
00035 
00036         int32 SharedHash::init(uint32 hash_size)
00037         {
00038                 int32 ret = 0;
00039 
00040                 // initialize parent
00041                 ret = Hash::init(hash_size);
00042                 if (ret == FAILURE)
00043                         return FAILURE;
00044 
00045                 // initilize mutex
00046                 ret = _mutex.init();
00047                 if (ret == FAILURE)
00048                         return FAILURE;
00049 
00050                 // ok
00051                 setOk(true);
00052                 return SUCCESS;
00053         }
00054 
00055         char* SharedHash::get(char* key, // key to get
00056         uint32 key_size, // key size in bytes
00057         bool try_lock              // whether to lock or try a lock
00058         )
00059         {
00060                 char* val = NULL;
00061 
00062                 if (try_lock) {
00063                         if (_mutex.tryLock() == FAILURE)
00064                                 return NULL;
00065                 } else
00066                         _mutex.lock();
00067 
00068                 val = Hash::get(key, key_size);
00069                 _mutex.unlock();
00070 
00071                 return val;
00072         }
00073 
00074         char* SharedHash::get(char* key, // key to get
00075         uint32 key_size, // key size in bytes
00076         uint32* val_size, // value size in bytes
00077         bool try_lock              // whether to lock or try a lock
00078         )
00079         {
00080                 char* val = NULL;
00081 
00082                 if (try_lock) {
00083                         if (_mutex.tryLock() == FAILURE)
00084                                 return NULL;
00085                 } else
00086                         _mutex.lock();
00087 
00088                 val = Hash::get(key, key_size, val_size);
00089                 _mutex.unlock();
00090 
00091                 return val;
00092         }
00093 
00094         int32 SharedHash::put(char* key, // key to put
00095         uint32 key_size, // key size in bytes
00096         char* val, // value to put (cast to char* may be needed)
00097         uint32 val_size, // value size in bytes
00098         bool replace, // whether to replace an existing key
00099         bool try_lock                   // whether to lock or try a lock
00100         )
00101         {
00102                 int32 ret;
00103 
00104                 if (try_lock) {
00105                         if (_mutex.tryLock() == FAILURE)
00106                                 return HASH_BUSY;
00107                 } else
00108                         _mutex.lock();
00109 
00110                 ret = Hash::put(key, key_size, val, val_size, replace);
00111                 _mutex.unlock();
00112 
00113                 return ret;
00114         }
00115 
00116         int32 SharedHash::pput(char* key, uint32 key_size, char* val,
00117                 bool replace, bool try_lock)
00118         {
00119                 int32 ret;
00120 
00121                 if (try_lock) {
00122                         if (_mutex.tryLock() == FAILURE)
00123                                 return HASH_BUSY;
00124                 } else
00125                         _mutex.lock();
00126 
00127                 ret = Hash::pput(key, key_size, val, replace);
00128                 _mutex.unlock();
00129 
00130                 return ret;
00131         }
00132 
00133         int32 SharedHash::del(char* key, // key to remove
00134         uint32 key_size, // key size in bytes
00135         bool try_lock              // whether to lock or try a lock
00136         )
00137         {
00138                 int32 ret;
00139 
00140                 if (try_lock) {
00141                         if (_mutex.tryLock() == FAILURE)
00142                                 return HASH_BUSY;
00143                 } else
00144                         _mutex.lock();
00145 
00146                 ret = Hash::del(key, key_size);
00147                 _mutex.unlock();
00148 
00149                 return ret;
00150         }
